attributes.action: Reduce the extortionate price of Diesel and Petrol (ie. remove some duty!/force BP etc to reduce profit)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we see almost daily increases in fuel prices Diesel and Petrol we the undersigned challenge the Prime Minister to bring the price of these essential fuels down and stop using 'Global Warming' as a smoke screen to tax the working man dry.  I believed in 'New Labour' - but having seen there efforts tax me more I would rather vote Conservative now!

Every year the government and the fuel companies make billions from fuel duty and the over-pricing of this resource - Think seriously about whether you need to fill up, the only way I believe to bring the price down is to stop buying!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
